author: Special Correspondent
text:
The City Civil Court has sentenced a 23-year-old man to five years’ rigorous imprisonment and imposed a fine of Rs. 50,000 on him for sexually assaulting an eight-year-old girl from his neighbourhood in the city in October 2014.

The accused, Munindra, had lured the girl with snacks while she was playing in front of her house, took her to an isolated place and sexually assaulted her. Munindra also threatened to kill the girl if she revealed the incident to anyone. However, the parents of the girl noticed that she was bleeding and took her to hospital, where doctors said that she had been sexually assaulted.

Based on the complaint, the Sanjaynagar police had arrested Munindra under the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act.
title: Youth gets five years’ RI
